comment:
* Interpolator that builds a lookup table to use. This is a fallback for
 * building a native interpolator from a TimeInterpolator that is not marked
 * with {@link HasNativeInterpolator}
 *
 * This implements TimeInterpolator to allow for easier interop with Animators
 * @hide

variables.name: MAX_SAMPLE_POINTS
variables.comment: If the duration of an animation is more than 300 frames, we cap the sample size to 300.

methods.name: private static float[] createLUT(TimeInterpolator interpolator, long duration)
public static long createNativeInterpolator(TimeInterpolator interpolator, long duration)
methods.comment: * Used to create a one-shot float[] LUT & native interpolator

methodNames: private static float[] createLUT(TimeInterpolator interpolator, long duration)
public static long createNativeInterpolator(TimeInterpolator interpolator, long duration)
